mapper.select: SELECT LOCATION_ID, DETAIL, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE,`city`.`CITY_ID` AS `CITY_ID`,`city`.`NAME` AS `CITYNAME`,`city`.`RANK` AS `RANK`,`province`.`NAME` AS `PROVINCE_NAME`,`province`.`PROVINCE_ID` AS `PROVINCE_ID`,`country`.`COUNTRY_ID` AS `COUNTRY_ID`,`country`.`NAME_CN` AS `NAME_CN`,`country`.`NAME_JP` AS `NAME_JP`,`country`.`NAME_US` AS `NAME_US`FROM((location LEFT JOIN `city` ON location.CITY = city.CITY_ID LEFT JOIN `province` ON ((`city`.`PROVINCE_ID` = `province`.`PROVINCE_ID`)))LEFT JOIN `country` ON ((`province`.`COUNTRY_ID` = `country`.`COUNTRY_ID`))) where location.LOCATION_ID = #{locationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
